notes.title: Cuisine
notes.subtitle: Préparer des cookies
notes.bodyText: To prepare cookies, mix together flour, sugar, butter, eggs, baking powder, and a pinch of salt, then form into balls and bake in a preheated oven until golden brown.

notes.title: Sport
notes.subtitle: Badminton
notes.bodyText: To maintain fitness, schedule two one-hour badminton sessions weekly from Monday to Friday, plus 20 minutes of daily exercise, and don't forget to include stretching.

notes.title: Cours de Mathémathique
notes.subtitle: Apprendre les fonctions et les dérivés
notes.bodyText: To grasp fundamental mathematics, focus on learning algorithms, equations, functions, derivatives, and related concepts.
